paint_overhaul.shapes

Class PaintShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • paint_overhaul.shapes.PaintShape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BetterRectangle, Ellipse, Fill, Line, Pencil, Polygon, Text, Triangle

    public abstract class PaintShape
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract PaintShape. This class is the default shape that all other shapes are extended from.
    Since:
    4.0

        4-input constructor for general shape.
        Parameters:
        x0 - Starting X location.
        y0 - Starting Y location.
        x1 - Ending X location.
        y1 - Ending Y location.

      • getIsPolygon

        public boolean getIsPolygon()
        Function to see if the current shape is a polygon.
        Returns:

        Function to set is polygon. Always false unless overridden.
